c74object.name: mb.2Dwavetable~
c74object.digest: 2D Wavetable plays 64 row wavetables allowing users to create evolving sounds.

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event

method.name: row
method.digest: The current row the wavetable is selecting (from 0 to 63)

method.name: envRows
method.digest: The number of rows modulated by the rowAdsr

method.name: adsr
method.digest:
Sets the parameters of the internal live.adsr~ with a list of attack decay sustain release inital peak final attack-slope decay-slope release-slope.
You do not need to use all of the arguments for this message.

method.name: rowAdsr
method.digest:
Sets the parameters of the internal live.adsr~ used to modulate the row number with each new note with a list of attack decay sustain release inital peak final attack-slope decay-slope release-slope.
You do not need to use all of the arguments for this message.
